page.title: 20LIFE STYLES:CHILDREN:LANGTON
page.content: MY NAME IS{MATTHEW HILL.I}AM TEN YEARS OLD.I LIVE IN {LANGTON HERRING},BUT I GO TO SCHOOL AT {CHICKERELL}.I PUT MOST OF THE {DOMESDAY PROJECT}WRITING ON THE COMPUTER. I LIKE LIVING IN {LANGTON HERRING} BECAUSE IT IS SMALL,QUIET AND FRIENDLY.THERE ARE 7 BOYS IN THE VILLAGE.TOM - 14 YEARS, RUSSELL - 12 YEARS, CHRIS - 11 YEARS, DANIEL 10 YEARS, NICKY -8 YEARS AND JAMES - 5 YEARS.WE ALL BUILT A BIG DEN AND WE PLAY AROUND THERE.WE ALSO HAVE A ROPE SWING.WE EITHER GO TO {BUDMOUTH {COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL}OR {CHICKERELL {PRIMARY SCHOOL.}IN THE MORNING WHILE WE WAIT FOR THE SCHOOL BUS WE HAVE A GAME OF WALLBALL.EVERY OTHER MONDAY THERE IS THE YOUTH CLUB.EVERY BOY AND GIRL OVER 9 YEARS GOES. CHRIS, TOM AND MYSELF ALL GO SHOOTING IN THE NEARBY WOODS.WE ARE GLAD TO LIVE IN {LANGTON.
